item.title: "starter"
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 1500000); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[5]), 5); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[7]), 7); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[8]), 8); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[9]), 9); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[10]), 10); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[11]), 11); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[12]), 12); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[13]), 13); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[14]), 14); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[15]), 15); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[16]), 16); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[17]), 17); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[18]), 18); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[19]), 19); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[20]), 20); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[21]), 21); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[22]), 22); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[23]), 23); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); disconnected = true; } }

Make sure you have “starter” written in your character files.
Also to ban people replace disconnected = true;
with

appendToBanned = true;

Read full topic

item.title: "starter"
item.dc:creator: @Ruppich Ruppich
item.description:
@Ruppich wrote:

Hey mates, I recently added the command “Starter” To my server, and I forgot how to kick/ban the player if he does it more then once

Heres muh code.

if (command.startsWith("Starter")) { addItem(995, 1500000); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[5]), 5); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[7]), 7); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[8]), 8); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[9]), 9); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[10]), 10); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[11]), 11); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[12]), 12); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[13]), 13); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[14]), 14); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[15]), 15); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[16]), 16); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[17]), 17); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[18]), 18); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[19]), 19); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[20]), 20); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[21]), 21); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[22]), 22); addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[23]), 23);
